field.Label: Select build
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT run_nb FROM `results` ORDER BY run_nb

report.SQLQuery: SELECT tc_status AS 'Status',COUNT(tc_status) AS 'Count' FROM results WHERE run_nb = '@Run_Number@' group by tc_status
SELECT run_nb,ce_hostname,ep_ip,ep_hostname,ep_name,suite_name,tc_name,tc_path,tc_status,tc_time_elapsed,tc_date_started,tc_date_finished,tc_log FROM results ORDER BY id
SELECT CONCAT('Run ',CAST(run_nb AS CHAR)) AS Run_Number,COUNT(tc_status) AS 'Nr of tests' FROM results GROUP BY run_nb
SELECT CONCAT('Run ',CAST(run_nb AS CHAR)) AS Run_Number,COUNT(tc_status) AS 'Success rate (%)' FROM results WHERE tc_status = 'PASS' GROUP BY run_nb
